subject: Baseball
Smoking and Tobacco
lead_paragraph: Smokeless tobacco, a staple of players for more than a century, will be banned from San Francisco’s AT&T Park at the beginning of next year, and more venues are likely to follow suit.
snippet: Smokeless tobacco, a staple of players for more than a century, will be banned from San Francisco’s AT&T Park at the beginning of next year, and more venues are likely to follow suit.
